name: 地質學特論
description: 讓學生瞭解當代地質學次領域，如大地構造、構造地質學、沉積學、地層學、古生物學、礦物學、岩石學等相關知識之最新成果介紹，並能整合其關聯性且統整於地球科學研究之應用。
goals: 學習、了解當代於地質科學方面知識及研究方法的現況
能將課程內容整合於地球科學系統之研究
能自我學習並研讀最新地質科學相關文獻
能將課程成果應用於其學位論文的研究
syllabus:
Week 01: Introduction

Week 02: Petrology

Week 03: Volcanology

Week 04: Modern Structural Geology

Week 05: Siliciclastic Sedimentary Geology

Week 06: Sophisticated Stratigraphy

Week 07: Lift History

Week 08: Geophysical Investigations

Week 09: Geochemistry

Week 10: Geochronology

Week 11: Tectonics

Week 12: Space Geodesy

Week 13: Hydrogeology

Week 14: Landscape Dynamics

Week 15: Paleoclimatology

Week 16: Geoinformatics

Week 17: Term Project Presentation

Week 18: Term Project Presentation

methodologies.note: Lectures will be conducted on a regular basis to ensure students familiar with updated Geology knowledge.
Group discussions will occur on regular basis on specific topics.
Presentations will be required on a predetermined topic.
Term papers will be required on a predetermined topic

grading.note: Students must ask questions and discuss topics.
Each case study will require a paper and presentation.
Students must choose specific topic(s) to present term project and write report.
